answers.answer: ITS PROBALLY A FUNGIS...TRY A NAIL TREATMENT FROM A LOCAL BEAUTY SUPPLY STORE.[IF YOU HAVE SALLY BEAUTY SUPPLY I KNOW THEY HAVE IT] THERE ARE QUITE A FEW PRODUCTS OUT THERE.IT PROBALLY WOULDNT HURT TO HAVE THE DR.LOOK EITHER.I DOUBT ITS DIABETES.I HOPE YOU NEVER EXPERIANCE THAT WITH HIM.    GOD BLESS
